code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useState}from'react';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const history=useHistory();const handleLogin=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:7115/User/Login',{username,password});localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.token);history.push('/dashboard');}catch(error){console.error('Login failed:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,children:"Login"})]});}export default Login;
